prompts.english_archetype: Summarize the following 5000-word legal document.
Extract all dates and names from the history book chapter.
prompts.target_translation: इतिहास-पुस्तकस्य अध्यायात् सर्वाणि दिनाङ्कानि नामानि च चिनु।

prompts.english_archetype: Identify the main themes in this 10-page essay.
prompts.target_translation: दश-पृष्ठात्मके निबन्धे मुख्यान् विषयान् चिह्नितं कुरु।

prompts.english_archetype: Find the contradiction in these two witness statements.
List all the ingredients mentioned in this cookbook.
prompts.target_translation: अस्यां पाकशास्त्र-पुस्तिकायां उल्लिखितानां सर्वेषां सामग्रीनां सूचीं कुरु।

prompts.english_archetype: Map the character relationships in this novel excerpt.
Timeline the events of the war described here.
Calculate the total revenue from this quarterly report.
Explain the scientific method based on this paper.
Compare the two political platforms detailed below.
Draft a response to this long email thread.
Create a quiz based on this textbook chapter.
Write an abstract for this technical specification.
Translate this short story while keeping cultural nuance.
prompts.target_translation: सांस्कृतिक-सूक्ष्मतां रक्षित्वा अस्याः लघुकथायाः अनुवादं कुरु।

prompts.english_archetype: Paraphrase this complex philosophical argument.
prompts.target_translation: इमं जटिलं दार्शनिक-तर्कं सरल-भाषया पुनः लिख।

prompts.english_archetype: Condense this meeting transcript into action items.
prompts.target_translation: अस्य सभा-विवरणस्य (transcript) कार्यान्वेय-बिन्दुसु (action items) परिवर्तनं कुरु।

prompts.english_archetype: Highlight the key risks in this investment prospectus.
Categorize the feedback in these 100 customer reviews.
Detect the sentiment in this long diary entry.
Anonymize the personal data in this medical record.
prompts.target_translation: अस्मिन् चिकित्सा-अभिलेखे (medical record) व्यक्तिगत-दत्तांशं (data) गुप्तं कुरु।

prompts.english_archetype: Format this raw text into a structured table.
prompts.target_translation: इमं अपरिष्कृतं पाठं (raw text) सारणीबद्धं कुरु।

prompts.english_archetype: Generate a tag cloud from this forum discussion.
prompts.target_translation: अस्याः चर्चायाः आधारणे शब्द-गुच्छं (tag cloud) जनय।

prompts.english_archetype: Identify the bias in this news article.
Fact-check the claims in this political speech.
Retrieve the answer to 'Who is the killer?' from this mystery story.
prompts.target_translation: अस्याः रहस्य-कथायाः 'घातकः कः?' इति प्रश्नस्य उत्तरं अन्वेषय।
